page.title: 03LIVING IN TOXTETH
page.content: My name is Carol and I live in {Toxteth,}Liverpool 8. People all over the world remember the riots and think Toxteth people are bad, and that Toxteth is a terrible place to live, but they are{wrong.}We live in a quiet place and our neighbours are very friendly. Our house is quite big and it has been{modernised.}We have three bedrooms and a living room, dinette and kitchen. We have a yard, not a garden. Our house is terraced and opens right onto the street. My dad used to work in a{car factory}but was made redundant. We don't have a car but we have teletext television and a video. I have 2 sisters and 1 brother and we usually get on very well. For our{holidays}we go to a caravan in North Wales or sometimes to a Holiday Camp.
